abstract: Adam Bryant Corner Office column features interview with Carmelyn P Malalis, chairwoman and commissioner of New York City Commission on Human Rights, who discusses her career and management technique.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Malalis, the chairwoman of the New York City Commission on Human Rights, believes in openly giving credit where credit is due.

headline.main: Carmelyn P. Malalis: Leading Through Praise, Not Fear

snippet: Ms. Malalis, the chairwoman of the New York City Commission on Human Rights, believes in openly giving credit where credit is due.
